doc:
Diana Bellamy https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Diana_Bellamy 0 Diana Alice Bellamy (September 19, 1943 – June 17, 2001) was an American character actress of stage, film, and television, during the 1980s and mid-2000s, who was often cast in both comedic and dramatic roles to great acclaim. Bellamy is perhaps best known for her starring role as Head Nurse Maggie Poole in the NBC comedy 13 East and Principal Cecilia Hall in Popular. Diana_Alice_Bellamy ( September_19_,_1943 – June_17_,_2001 ) was an_American_character_actress of stage , film , and television , during the_1980s_and_mid-2000s , who was_often_cast in both comedic_and_dramatic_roles to great_acclaim . Bellamy is_perhaps_best_known for her_starring_role as Head_Nurse_Maggie_Poole in the_NBC_comedy 13_East_and_Principal_Cecilia_Hall in Popular .
